properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX out 20 NM; Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 3:46AM CST until January 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX out
20 NM and Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to
60 NM.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY
